duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct quality inspections and tests to ensure compliance with standards such as ISO9000, AS9100, Military Standards, IPC 610, 620, J-STD-001.
Perform First Article Inspection (FAI) per AS9102 and internal audits to identify and mitigate risks.
Manage nonconforming products/processes and implement corrective/preventive actions as per regulatory requirements.
Maintain document control, perform root cause analysis, and participate in Material Review Board (MRB) activities.
Analyze key process indicators (KPI) and contribute to continuous improvement processes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Certification in Quality Management a plus)
